Name: GLADIUM
About the game: GLADIUM is an action game set in the Roman gladiatorial era. With a focus on brutal boss fights and a progression system based on blood and gold, you will have to embrace death to be victorious. HEART POUNDING BOSS FIGHTS Challenge the unforgiving champions of the arena with their own unique mechanics and tactics! ACTION COMBAT Fast-paced action combat featuring dodging, parrying, special attacks and more! GLADIATORS OF OLD Fight against enemy gladiators with appearance and behaviour based on the gladiator classes of ancient Rome, from the Murmillo to the Crupellarius! PIT FIGHTING Get a random weapon and fight one versus one against another gladiator with his own random weapon! ENDLESS MODE Face never-ending waves of enemies and bosses with highscores. Display your blood-spilling ability with online leaderboards! UPGRADES AND UNLOCKS Earn coins in the arena to purchase new weapons and shields - find your playstyle! Unlock unique helmets offering diverse effects from completing various tasks! Spend blood to unlock and customize the powers of your special attack!
